data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Siwan, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Siwan, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 36,636 believers in Siwan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Siwan, Bihar, India. Please, stir the 36,636 believers here to pray for awakening.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Siwan. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Atishbaz people.
Father, grace the churches in Siwan, Bihar, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 3,253,454 lost people in  Siwan, Bihar, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Siwan to exponentially multiply disciples.

location.name: Siwan
location.people_groups_list: Bedia (Muslim traditions), Aoghar, Rajput Garewal (Hindu traditions), Rajput Dikhit, Rajbhar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bedia (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Aoghar (100), Rajput Garewal (Hindu traditions) (315,000), Rajput Dikhit (263,000), Rajbhar (73,000)
